title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

First Point:

Philosophy: There is a correct connection made between the values of the function given and the areas given in the stem of the problem that will lead to the answer.

The first point is earned if a given value of the function is combined correctly with an integral or integrals leading to the answer. These integrals can be expressed in words.

The first point is earned if a given value of the function is combined correctly with the numerical areas given in the stem of the problem.

The statement that the limit gives the indeterminate form 0 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaapaqaa8qacaaIWaaapaqaa8qacaaIWaaaaaaa@3AE0@ earns the first point.

Arrows indicating that the numerator and denominator both go to zero are okay as long as there is no equating of the limit to 0 0 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaapaqaa8qacaaIWaaapaqaa8qacaaIWaaaaiaac6caaaa@3B92@ For example,

· The statement lim x→ 5 − g(x)−9 x 2 −25 = g (5)−9 5 2 −25 → → 0 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWfqaqaaabaaa aaaaaapeGaciiBaiaacMgacaGGTbaal8aabaWdbiaadIhacqGHsgIR caaI1aWdamaaCaaameqabaWdbiabgkHiTaaaaSWdaeqaaOWdbmaala aapaqaa8qacaWGNbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaeyOeI0IaaGyoaaWd aeaapeGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaOGaeyOeI0IaaG OmaiaaiwdaaaGaeyypa0ZaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaadEgacaaMi8Uaaiik aiaaiwdacaGGPaGaeyOeI0IaaGyoaaWdaeaapeGaaGyna8aadaahaa Wcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaOGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaiaaiwdaaaWdauaabeqa ceaaaeaapeGaeyOKH4kapaqaa8qacqGHsgIRaaWdamaalaaabaGaaG imaaqaaiaaicdaaaaaaa@5C9D@ earns the point.

· The false equation lim x→ 5 − g(x)−9 x 2 −25 = 0 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWfqaqaaabaaa aaaaaapeGaciiBaiaacMgacaGGTbaal8aabaWdbiaadIhacqGHsgIR caaI1aWdamaaCaaameqabaWdbiabgkHiTaaaaSWdaeqaaOWdbmaala aapaqaa8qacaWGNbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaeyOeI0IaaGyoaaWd aeaapeGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaOGaeyOeI0IaaG OmaiaaiwdaaaGaeyypa0ZdamaalaaabaGaaGimaaqaaiaaicdaaaaa aa@4DAC@ does not earn the point.

The second point is earned if there is an apparent attempt at computing the derivatives of the numerator and denominator, even if the derivatives are incorrect.

If the attempted derivatives are incorrect, the response will earn the second point, but not the third point.

Any incorrect statement of equality here, e.g., lim x→ 5 − g(x)−9 x 2 −25 = g ′ (x) 2x = 3 5 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWfqaqaaabaaa aaaaaapeGaciiBaiaacMgacaGGTbaal8aabaWdbiaadIhacqGHsgIR caaI1aWdamaaCaaameqabaWdbiabgkHiTaaaaSWdaeqaaOWdbmaala aapaqaa8qacaWGNbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaeyOeI0IaaGyoaaWd aeaapeGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaOGaeyOeI0IaaG OmaiaaiwdaaaGaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaaceWGNbGbauaacaGGOaGaamiE aiaacMcaaeaacaaIYaGaamiEaaaacqGH9aqppaWaaSaaaeaacaaIZa aabaGaaGynaaaacaGGSaaaaa@5481@ will earn the second point, but not the third point; note that even just one of the two false equalities in the preceding example results in not earning the third point.

Equating multiple non-equivalent expressions may be eligible to earn one of the first two points (even when more than one communication error occurs). For example, a response with both statements lim x→ 5 − g(x)−9 x 2 −25 = 0 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWfqaqaaabaaa aaaaaapeGaciiBaiaacMgacaGGTbaal8aabaWdbiaadIhacqGHsgIR caaI1aWdamaaCaaameqabaWdbiabgkHiTaaaaSWdaeqaaOWdbmaala aapaqaa8qacaWGNbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaeyOeI0IaaGyoaaWd aeaapeGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaOGaeyOeI0IaaG OmaiaaiwdaaaGaeyypa0ZdamaalaaabaGaaGimaaqaaiaaicdaaaaa aa@4DAC@ and lim x→ 5 − g(x)−9 x 2 −25 = g ′ (x) 2x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWfqaqaaabaaa aaaaaapeGaciiBaiaacMgacaGGTbaal8aabaWdbiaadIhacqGHsgIR caaI1aWdamaaCaaameqabaWdbiabgkHiTaaaaSWdaeqaaOWdbmaala aapaqaa8qacaWGNbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaeyOeI0IaaGyoaaWd aeaapeGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaOGaeyOeI0IaaG OmaiaaiwdaaaGaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaaceWGNbGbauaacaGGOaGaamiE aiaacMcaaeaacaaIYaGaamiEaaaaaaa@5130@ does not earn the first point, earns the second point, and is eligible for the third point (with the correct answer).

The third point is earned only for the answer of 3 5 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaaio daaeaacaaI1aaaaiaacYcaaaa@3B39@ or its numeric equivalent.
